radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse hyperostosis with thickened calvaria measuring up to 3.8 cm. All foramina were significantly narrowed, with occlusion of the shunt catheter.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant increase in the size of the frontal horns of the lateral ventricles compared with the last CT scan acquired a few months earlier.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Demonstrated drained ventricles after revision of the shunt.
